alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Lower Snake River Plain; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 11:48AM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Jefferson, northwestern Bonneville, western Madison and central Bingham Counties through 1230 PM MDT... At 1148 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles northwest of Shelley, or 14 miles west of Idaho Falls, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Idaho Falls, Rigby, Ammon, Iona, Ucon, Menan, Roberts, Lewisville, Osgood, and Kettle Butte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Lower Snake River Plain; Upper Snake River Plain
